PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FilterPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Filter performance history attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: CountedEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Filter efficiency based the particle counts concentration before and after filter against particles with certain size distribution.

PropertyDef.Name: WeightedEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Filter efficiency based the particle weight concentration before and after filter against particles with certain size distribution.

PropertyDef.Name: ParticleMassHolding
PropertyDef.Definition: Mass of particle holding in the filter.
